website_summaries.verdict: The Hoka One One Rincon is a running shoe geared toward neutral runners, but it has just a hint of firmness and energy return that allows it to be versatile for a wide range of workouts.  It will appeal to runners who prefer a light, breezy feeling under their feet, no matter how fast or slow they prefer to run in it. Despite some durability issues, the Hoka One One Rincon is still appreciated for having the right amount of cushioning for recovery efforts. It is also lightweight enough for fast race days, making this Hoka shoe a versatile addition to any athlete's running shoe arsenal.
pros: Majority of Hoka One One Rincon users like the fact that the shoe is incredibly lightweight
Most of the wearers appreciate the shoe’s breathability, keep them comfortable during their runs
A number of users compare it to the popular Clifton 6 with how good the cushioning is
A couple of wearers say that even after long hours of wearing the Rincon, their feet do not feel fatigued at all
The shoe is said to be very comfortable straight out of the box which a lot of users like
Some wearers like the Rincon for its unique aesthetic design
cons: One user has mentioned that the outsoles of the Hoka One One Rincon wear down too quickly
A couple of wearers have noted that the shoe’s rubber outsole is too minimal for their liking

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but found cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I’ve had the hoka Clifton’s before and got a bunch of miles out of them! Would of been 5 stars but I just found the same shoes on Zappos for $114. Should of done a little more searching.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad about giving these a negative review because they are probably great shoes for not people. They are very light and comfortable. The problem I have with these shoes is I have very flat feet. In all of my internet searching for the best tuning shoes for flat feet, these shoes were consistently rated the best. They aren’t. They lasted me a week before the entire show was broken down and my knees were aching. I was able to return them and now my search begins anew for a good shoe for flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: You have to own a pair
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to HOKA a year ago. I have always had problem with finding the right show. It's like a barber. You want to find the right one, and when you do, you never look back! That is what HOKA is for me. I highly recommend you give HOKA a try. Especially if you are an active runner or crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shock Absorbers for Knees and Feet
customer_reviews.text: YES. Worth the price. I log miles on streets and sidewalks. Lightweight with impressive cushioning for my 72 yr old knees and feet. I can now include jogging in my brisk walk regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Muebles

customer_reviews.title: It should be clarified whether the shoe is suitable for the wide foot or not
customer_reviews.text: The shoe's quality did not match my feet because it caused me problems when using it, so I used my old shoes
customer_reviews.author: Nasser

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably light and they are built with the proper support I have worn The Hoka brand for years. I couldn’t be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: william Corliss

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet and heavier guys
customer_reviews.text: I'm a heavy guy that wanted to start running. These are the only shoes that don't give me shin splints or back pain after running.
customer_reviews.author: Jovani Lechadores

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker much cheaper elsewhere why even now it’s cheaper than wat I pain disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would only wear Hoka running shoes .
customer_reviews.text: I like my running shoes +1 size from my normal size . My last 4 pairs of running shoes are Hokas . Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality for such a high price
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the running shoes are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The materials made so light so quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am walking a lot at work. So it’s great to have this kind of support shows. I like so much.
customer_reviews.author: melaku mulissa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I like the cushioned feel of the shoe and it is good looking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Hoka I'm used to
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of Hoka One One models over the years, and have really liked them. I was looking forward to the Rincon's light weight and speed, based on other reviews I read. The shows are in fact light, but they change my gait so much that I got terrible upper hip pain. Even just walking I can feel the strain in my hip - and I don't normally have any hip issues. From my point of view there's something severely wrong with the design of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Marc K

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift. Now getting another gift for my sister-in-law! Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my brother and he loves the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Carolann Doyal

customer_reviews.title: Just enough cushion...pairs well with OTC orthotics.
customer_reviews.text: I was having difficulty with plantar fasciitis. The Rincons are very lightweight with moderate cushioning. Lighter and less structured than the Clifton 6. I paired the Rincon with OTC Dr. Scholl's orthotics for plantar fasciitis and they have been working well for me (still room in the toebox). As another reviewer stated, MUCH CHEAPER elsewhere. I just purchased a second pair from the Running Warehouse for $91.00 with free shipping. ALSO, the runrepeat website is a great source for running shoe reviews and automatic price comparisons. Stay healthy and enjoy the run :)
customer_reviews.author: Bushido786

product_meta.title: HOKA ONE ONE Rincon Men's 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Inspired by the smooth waves of the world-famous Rincon surf spot, this shoe is easily a best-in-class contender. The Rincon packs an amazing amount of cushion into an extremely lightweight shoe for an effortlessly soft, weightless sensation while running. With an upper featuring an asymmetrical design and a stripped-back profile, this shoe gives you a speedy boost that is ready for training sessions or race day. It is simply fast.
